item.title: THM - Careers in Cyber - Walkthrough
item.description: Task 1 - Introduction Check out the various careers offered in cyber security, and their respective responsibilities. Note the possible learning path leading to them. Question 1: Let’s start exploring the different roles in cyber security! No answer needed Task 2 - Security Analyst Question 1: Read about what a security analyst does. No answer needed Task 3 - Security Engineer Question 1: Read about what a security engineer does.
